book.title: Greeting
Contend for the Faith
book.note: "Jude" is the traditional form of the name introducing the letter, but the Greek form is the same as "Judas"
Or "people," since the Greek term can be used in a generic sense, but if this statement is related to 2 Peter 2:12, it is more likely men are in view
book.title: Condemnation of the Ungodly False Teachers
book.note: Some manuscripts place this word in the following clause
book.title: Persevere in the Love of God
book.note: Some manuscripts have "to convict every soul"
Lit. "respecting faces for the sake of advantage"
book.title: Benediction
